title: Urbanization in Rwanda 2018
yAxis: Share of urban population in total population
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Share of urban population in total population, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2018 to 2012.
Also, the next significant trend is slightly neutral which exists from 2010 to 2008.
Also, the next significant trend is slightly neutral which exists from 2012 to 2011.
Also, the next significant trend is slightly positive which exists from 2011 to 2010.
gold: This statistic shows the degree of urbanization in Rwanda from 2008 to 2018 . Urbanization means the share of urban population in the total population of a country . In 2018 , 17.21 percent of Rwanda 's total population lived in urban areas and cities .
